title: Kitāb at-Taḥaddī li-'l-ʿulamāʾ wa-'l-ǧahāl wa-'r-radd ʿalā 'z-zanīm wa-ġairihi min aḍ-ḍalāl al-kufra al-faǧra al-aubāš al-anḏāl
creator: al-Mahdī li-Dīn Allāh al-Ḥusain Ibn-al-Qāsim Ibn-ʿAlī,
subject: Außereuropäische Handschriften
source: al-Mahdī li-Dīn Allāh al-Ḥusain Ibn-al-Qāsim Ibn-ʿAlī,: Kitāb at-Taḥaddī li-'l-ʿulamāʾ wa-'l-ǧahāl wa-'r-radd ʿalā 'z-zanīm wa-ġairihi min aḍ-ḍalāl al-kufra al-faǧra al-aubāš al-anḏāl. Jemen
